display_long_description:
🏒 **NHL® Sense Arena 25™ is the only VR hockey experience officially licensed by the NHL.** 

Whether you're a developing hockey player, an elite goalie, or you want the best VR hockey game experience, NHL Sense Arena delivers a realistic and effective way to train and play—anytime, anywhere in virtual reality. Join thousands of hockey players who train in VR!

[media]

**MAKE ANY SPACE YOUR VIRTUAL RINK**

Step into the rink with full NHL season gameplay, NEW 3v3 Stanley Cup Playoffs mode, and high-intensity VR drills that boost skills, hockey sense, and confidence. Designed to improve decision-making, scanning, and awareness, it’s trusted by NHL teams and top youth programs worldwide.

🎮 **BASE GAME:**  $29.99 (no subscription needed)

- 2024–25 NHL Season Mode (32 Teams)
- 3v3 Stanley Cup Playoffs Full-Ice Mode
- Open Skate & 3 Arenas
- Realistic NHL Gameplay

[media]

📈 **HOCKEY PLAYER TRAINING:** (subscription) 

Annual Plan: $34/mo

Monthly Plan: $59/mo


🏒 **TRAINING:**
- 100+ drills for skaters and goalies
- Plans by USA Hockey, NHL players & pro coaches
- Guided workouts and skill tracking
- Improve scanning, reaction time, and hockey IQ

[media]

🥅 **GOALIE MODE:**

- Master angles, shot tracking, and saves through traffic—plus mental warmups to prep before games.

[media]

Whether you’re training off the ice or chasing the Cup, NHL Sense Arena delivers pro-level hockey development and games—right in your living room!
